name: Sacred Grove
description: A protected forest grove serves as a natural temple where the divine and natural worlds meet, providing spiritual sanctuary and connection to nature. The sacred nature provides protection and spiritual guidance, while the natural beauty and divine presence attract both worshippers and those seeking to exploit its power.
atmosphere: Ancient trees form natural cathedral where divine and natural worlds meet. Air carries sacred earth, divine presence, and spiritual sanctuary scent. Footsteps are muffled on soft earth that seems to absorb sound. Skin tingles with presence of spiritual guidance and natural beauty. Taste of natural wisdom and divine connection fills mouth. Weight of divine protection and sacred nature presses down like gentle embrace.
